mapper.select: select phone,name from water_bill join user on water_bill.user_id = user.id where status = #{code}

select name, wb.time,wb.price,wb.summation,wb.cost,wb.status, wm.previous_reading,wm.reading, b.building_num,b.floor,b.doorplate from water_bill wb join user on wb.user_id = user.id join building b on b.id = wb.building_id join water_meter wm on wb.water_meter_id = wm.id where wb.time BETWEEN #{startOfMonth} AND #{endOfMonth} order by wb.time desc,b.id

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m') AS time, SUM(summation) AS num, ROUND(SUM(summation) / COUNT(DISTINCT user_id)) AS avg_num FROM water_bill WHERE time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY time

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m') AS time, SUM(cost) AS num, ROUND(SUM(cost) / COUNT(DISTINCT user_id)) AS avg_num FROM water_bill WHERE time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY time
